title: $2,150 / 5rm 3br about 800 sq ft Avail 8/1 (Brockton)
posting_body: ['$2,150\xa0/ 5rm 3br about 800 sq ft Avail 8/1\xa0(Brockton)', '5rm 3bd, third floor, gas heat by steam, cats ok.', 'De-leaded unit and building with certificates.', 'First, Last and $1,000 Security ($5,300).', 'Brand new Silestone countertops, off street parking and three porches.', 'You pay for heat and electricity.', 'Available August 1st.', 'Please have pay-stubs and other information readily available', "so it's easier to verify your information all at once.", 'This is a non-smoking building, there is a front and back porch on which to smoke.', 'NO OPEN HOUSES RIGHT NOW.', 'Please TEXT during the day as I am working, you can call at night.', 'Ari - 508-944-5606', 'Please apply online at: <URL>', 'I will go through your application on the phone and then setup individual appointments to show this.']
